products.name: Lemon
products.description: Lemon is a common name for three fragrant and acid-flavored citrus fruits , mainly used in the food industry.

products.name: Avocado
products.description: It is a species native to Mesoamerica , specifically the highlands of central and eastern Mexico , Guatemala and El Salvador

products.name: Tomato
products.description: The tomato is the fruit of the plant Solanum lycopersicum , which has culinary importance and is used as vegetables . It is considered a vegetable

products.name: Orange
products.description: It is a fleshy hesperidium with a more or less thick and hardened skin, and its pulp is typically made up of eleven segments or skins filled with juice

products.name: Apple
products.description: The apple is the edible fruit of the Malus domestica species , the common apple tree. It is a round shaped pomegranate fruit with a very sweet taste, depending on the variety.
